concept.title: Protocol plug-in
concept.shortdesc: The protocol plug-in allow you to configure and show protocol plug-ins, the protocol plug-in properties file, the protocol plug-in server host IP address or host name, the protocol plug-in server port number, the protocol plug-in debug server host IP address or host name, the protocol plug-in debug port number, the maximum heap size of the JVM remote debugger, and runtime parameters of the protocol plug-in server JVM. You can view protocol plug-ins and protocols that are on the server. You can also start, stop, and restart the protocol plug-in server.
